details: Biochemistry Research Assistant (Feb - Mar 2025): Investigated methods for the cloning, expression and purification of gasdermin proteins
Data Science Researcher (Sep 2024 - Mar 2025): Analyzed media trends of AI political polarization and evolving usage of environmental terminology
Neuroscience Research Assistant (Jan - May 2023): Studied attentional control and satiety impacts on odor perception
Food Systems Qualitative Data Analyst (Jul - Sep 2023): Analyzed key themes and stakeholders using expert interviews and presentations on global food system transformation with NVivo
Ecological Research Assistant (Sep 2020 - Apr 2021): Classified animals in 2000+ camera trap images using Timelapse software in a Windows virtual machine
